FuncDef:
The clock command sets the clock mode of a CPOS interface.
The undo clock command restores the default setting.
By default, a CPOS interface works in master clock mode.

ParaDef.Info:
Configures the clock on a CPOS interface to work in master mode.
-

Configures a CPOS interface to work in slave clock mode.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
When CPOS interfaces on two Routers are directly connected, one CPOS interface must work in master clock mode and use internal clock signals, and the other CPOS interface must work in slave clock mode and use line clock signals.
Precautions
Link flapping may occur if the clock works in improper mode.
